text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide hl7.fhir.eu.eps

Hl7EuPatientSummaryIg

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.eu/fhir/eps/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.eu.eps

This guide describes how the Patient Summary can be represented in the European REALM.

name: Hl7EuPatientSummaryIg
title: HL7 Europe Patient Summary
description: This guide describes how the Patient Summary can be represented in the European REALM.
copyright: Used by permission of HL7 Europe, all rights reserved Creative Commons License

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

grouping.name: Structures: Logical Models
grouping.description: These define data models that represent the domain covered by this implementation guide in more business-friendly terms than the underlying FHIR resources.

grouping.name: Structures: Resource Profiles
grouping.description: These define constraints on FHIR resources for systems conforming to this implementation guide.

grouping.name: Structures: Extension Definitions
grouping.description: These define constraints on FHIR data types for systems conforming to this implementation guide.

grouping.name: Terminology: Value Sets
grouping.description: These define sets of codes used by systems conforming to this implementation guide.

grouping.name: Terminology: Concept Maps
grouping.description: These define transformations to convert between codes by systems conforming with this implementation guide.

grouping.name: Example: Example Instances
grouping.description: These are example instances that show what data produced and consumed by systems conforming with this implementation guide might look like.

resource.name: Bundle (EPS)
resource.description: Clinical document used to represent a Patient Summary for the scope of this project.

resource.name: Composition (EPS)
resource.description: Clinical document used to represent a Patient Summary for the scope of this project.

resource.name: A - Patient Summary
resource.description: Patient Summary. eHN guideline model.

resource.name: A.2.1.1 - Allergy
resource.description: Allergy. Section A.2.1.1

resource.name: A.2.2.1 - Vaccination/ prophylaxis information
resource.description: Vaccination/ prophylaxis information. Sections A2.2.2.1 of the eHN guideline.

resource.name: A.2.2.2 - Resolved, closed or inactive problems
resource.description: Resolved, closed or inactive problems. Section A.2.2.2 of the eHN guideline.

resource.name: A.2.3.1 Current problems
resource.description: Current problems. Section A.2.3.1 of the eHN guideline.

resource.name: A.2.3.2 - Medical devices and implants
resource.description:
Medical devices and implants
Section A.2.3.2 of the eHN guideline.

resource.name: A.2.3.3 - Functional Status
resource.description: Functional Status. Section A.2.3.3 of the eHN guideline.

resource.name: A.2.3.3 - Procedures
resource.description: Procedures.Section A.2.3.3 of the eHN guideline.

resource.name: A.2.4.1 Current and relevant past medicines
resource.description:
Relevant prescribed medicines whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not, or medicines that influence current health status or are relevant to a clinical decision.
Section A2.4.1 of the eHN guideline.

resource.name: A.2.6 Pregnancy history
resource.description: Functional Status. Section A.2.3.3 of the eHN guideline.

resource.name: A.2.8 - Results
resource.description: Results data elements. Section A2.8 of the eHN guideline.

resource.name: A1.1, A1.2 - Subject of care
resource.description: Patient or Subject of care. Sections A1.1 and A1.2 of the eHN guideline.

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance (EPS)
resource.description: This profile constrains the AllergyIntolerance resource for the purpose of the European patient summary.

resource.name: Condition (EPS)
resource.description: This profile constrains the Condition resource for the purpose of the European patient summary.

resource.name: Consent (Advance Directives EPS)
resource.description: This profile constrains the Consent resource for the purpose representing Advance Directives for the scope of this guide.

resource.name: Device (EPS)
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the Device resource for the purpose of this guide. A device used by or implanted on the patient is described in the hospital discharge report as an instance of a Device resource constrained by this profile.

resource.name: DeviceUseStatement (EPS)
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the DeviceUseStatement resource for the purpose of this guide. A device used by or implanted on the patient is described in the hospital discharge report as an instance of a Device resource constrained by this profile.

resource.name: Flag (EPS)
resource.description: This profile constrains the Flag resource to represent alerts or warnings in FHIR for the purpose of this project.

resource.name: Immunization (EPS)
resource.description: This profile constrains the Immunization resource for the purpose of the European patient summary.

resource.name: ImmunizationRecommendation (EPS)
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent Immunization Recommandations for the purpose of the European patient summary.

resource.name: Medication (EPS)
resource.description: This profile constrains the Medication resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: Medication Statement (EPS)
resource.description: This profile constrains the MedicationStatement resource for the purpose of the European patient summary.

resource.name: MedicationAdministration (EPS)
resource.description: This profile constrains the MedicationAdministration resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: MedicationDispense (EPS)
resource.description: This profile constrains the MedicationDispense resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: MedicationRequest (EPS)
resource.description: This profile constrains the MedicationRequest resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: Observation: country visited (EPS)
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation resource to record, search, and fetch travel history.

resource.name: Patient (EPS)
resource.description:
This profile defines how to represent a human Patient in HL7 FHIR for the purpose of this guide.
When the ips-pat-1 invariant is satisfied \(Patient.name.given, Patient.name.family or Patient.name.text SHALL be present\) then this profile complies with the IPS patient profile.

resource.name: Procedure (EPS)
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the Procedure resource by this guide.

resource.name: Condition Status Reason
resource.description: This extension describe the reasons for the condition status, e.g. how this condition has been resolved

resource.name: Immunization AdministeredProduct
resource.description:
This extension references the Medication administered during the vaccination.
It simulates the beahviour of the reference part of the administeredProduct R5 element

resource.name: Supporting Information
resource.description: This extension refers other resources from the patient record that may be relevant to the event. The information from these resources was either used to create the instance or is provided to help with its interpretation. This extension should not be used if more specific inline elements or extensions are available.

resource.name: Medical Devices (SNOMED CT)
resource.description: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 49062001 \|Device (physical object)\|.

resource.name: Medical Devices - SNOMED CT + Absent/Unknown - IPS
resource.description: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms (SNOMED CT®) that are included in: all descendants of 49062001 \|Device (physical object)\|, plus IPS codes for absent/unknown devices.

resource.name: Severity
resource.description: The Value Set is used for all Problems and Allergies in the Patient Summary to indicate the severity of the problem (or Allergy)

resource.name: eHN Alerts Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Alerts Model to this guide mapping

resource.name: eHN Patient Summary to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN Patient Summary to this guide Map

resource.name: eHN Subject to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN Subject Model to this guide Map

resource.name: EPSBundle-Beispiel 1
resource.description: APS ohne Probleme, Medikamente oder Allergien (Minimalbeispiel)
